synonyms: svarita-ñitaḥ—of verbs having an indicatory ñ or a svarita accent; kartṛ-abhiprāye—is meant for the agent; kriyā-phale—when the fruit of the action.
translation: " 'The terminations of the ātmanepada are employed when the fruit of the action accrues to the agent of verbs having an indicatory ñ or a svarita accent.'

purport.content: This is a quotation from Pāṇini's sūtras (1.3.72).
